mapper.insert: insert into students (userid, password, name, ssn, reg_date, subject) values (#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{regDate}, #{subject})
mapper.select: select stu_num stuNum, userid, password, name, ssn, reg_date regDate, subject, profile_img profileImg from students
mapper.update: update students set subject = #{subject} where stu_num like #{stuNum}
delete from students where stu_num like #{stuNum}
